content: here is the fancy zigzag dishcloth pattern it is a quick and easy pattern so that you can whip up a lovely and functional project in a very short time perfect to use yourself as a dishcloth or washcloth or to give as a gift of kitchen items or as an addition to a spa gift basket skill level beginner size one size 10 inches x 10 inches ** i recommend reading through the entire pattern before you begin that way you can have a good idea of what is included and you won t run into any surprises while you are working on the project ** materials needed approximately 75 yards of cotton yarn i used lily sugar n cream 100% cotton #4 weight yarn - crochet hook size g 4 00 mm scissors tapestry needle used for working in loose yarn ends finished size approximately 10 inches x 10 inches this pattern uses us crochet terminology stitches used in the pattern - chain = chain - skip = skip - chain-2 space = chain 2 space - slip_stitch = slip_stitch - single_crochet = single_crochet - double_crochet = double_crochet special stitches shell shell gauge 4 inch square = 5 5 clusters by 6 5 row
